name: Purlos
description:
Purlos is an artificially intelligent ‘digital buddy’ for students.

Purlos automatically answers 1000’s of questions relating to a student’s studies which greatly reduces the huge number enquiries staff receive. 

Each student will recieve personalised reponses and can ask about ‘campus life’ ‘library services’, 'welfare’ and ‘timetabling’ and 'assessment'.

jobs.title: Head of Product Development
jobs.description:
The reason we exist is to improve education through technology. 

Why? Because, time wise, your career takes up the biggest portion of your life and we want you to enjoy it, to grow and to succeed. 

How? We are creating the world’s first personalised learning chatbot for SMEs and growth businesses. Through intelligent course tailoring, state-of-the-art machine learning methods, and ground-breaking technology.  

Who? We are two co-founders with experience of growing start-ups in the UK.  We are looking for a technical lead to help build our flagship product, and we’re on the hunt for a Head of Product.  

The Head of Product Development will be joining a team a two and will be offered an equity stake in the business. The team has previously built and exited a successful start-up business last year. We also have vast experience in both fund raising and generating new business.

We would need an experienced developer to help build the MVP, with the view to step into a managerial role and hire other developers later down the line.

Understanding the full stack and the most cutting-edge platforms and coding languages is important. It would be useful to understand technologies such as React Native, AWS/Azure and most importantly ‘recommendation systems’ and machine learning. We offer: 

•	Equity
•	Share options programme
•	Pension scheme
•	Increasing holiday allowance with tenure
•	Friends & family discount

Please get in touch if you are interested in this exciting opportunity.
